answers.answer: I did! I actually passed out after they took the test. It was horrible! But my test results were great my ob said it was normal
If you throw up they normally make you take it again
I did. I didn't throw up but I got really dizzy and had to lay down

Being dizzy is normal your taking in a lot of sugar at one time but you should be fine I took the first one and failed it and had to take the 3 hour one that was hard then they told me a had gestational diabetes good luck
After about a half hour after my test I felt really weak and hot like I was in a sauna… I get my results soon…im 26 weeks

question: The last 5 minutes of the glucose test I almost fainted and ended up getting suck I find out results tomorrow.. Anyone felt like this?
title: almost fainting and threw up during glucose test
